column3: April 7 Pratt & Whitney
column4: the engine-making unit of United Technologies Corp

column2: COLUMN-Smart shopping for mid-caps CHICAGO
column3: April 7 Go for the most famous companies when you are investing
column4: and you are likely to pay the highest price possible because most investors place a premium on the biggest-name stocks. But take a look at the roughly 1
column5: 500 companies that make up the mid-cap market
column6: and you could be making a pretty solid investment this year.

column2: U.S. FTC can sue hotel group over poor data security
column3: court rulesUPDATE 1-U.S. FTC can sue hotel group over poor data security
column4: court rules WASHINGTON
column5: April 7 A U.S. court ruled on Monday that the Federal Trade Commission can proceed with a lawsuit against hotel group Wyndham Worldwide Corp for allegedly failing to safeguard consumers' personal information.  UPDATE 1-U.S. FTC can sue hotel group over poor data security
